title: Subchapter A - Public Employees' Safety And Health
content:
Subchapter A - Public Employees' Safety And Health

State Regulations

Part 800 - Public Employees' Occupational Safety And Health Standards (§ 800.1 to 800.7)

Part 801 - Recording And Reporting Public Employees' Occupational Injuries And Illnesses (§ 801.0 to 801.47)

Part 802 - Inspection Of Places Of Public Employment (§ 802.1 to 802.7)

Part 803 - Variance Regulations (§ 803.1 to 803.28)

Part 805 - Petition For Employee Contest Of Abatement Period (§ 805.1 to 805.6)

Part 840 -  (§ 840.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 800 - Public Employees' Occupational Safety And Health Standards (§ 800.1 to 800.7)
